main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object resembling an aircraft with a fin, which seemed to be backing away.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on July 5, 1962 at 9:50 PM EST., The observation lasted for 30 seconds., The object was reported to be unidentifiable and not classified as a conventional aircraft., The witness was preparing to observe Venus when they noticed the object., The object disappeared from view behind a tree.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object resembling an aircraft
